line_1: I Gat your letter, winsome Willie;
line_2: Wi' gratefu' heart I thank you brawlie;

line_1: I Gat your letter, winsome Willie;
line_2: Tho' I maun say't, I wad be silly,

line_1: I Gat your letter, winsome Willie;
line_2: Should I believe, my coaxin billie,

line_1: Through the lang muir I'll think of my Willie,
line_2: Through the lang muir I'll think o' my Willie,

line_1: Through the lang muir I'll think o' my Willie,
line_2: Through the lang muir I'll think of my Willie,

line_1: An' Livistone, the bauld Sir Willie;
An' Livistone, the bauld Sir Willie;
An' Livistone, the bauld Sir Willie;
